lyrics:
238 contributorstranslationsportuguêsفارسیtürkçeespañoldeutschрусскийdie for you lyricsverse 1
im findin ways to articulate the feelin im goin through
i just cant say i dont love you yeah
cause i love you yeah
its hard for me to communicate the thoughts that i hold
but tonight im gon let you know
let me tell the truth
baby let me tell the truth yeah

prechorus
you know what im thinkin see it in your eyes
you hate that you want me hate it when you cry
youre scared to be lonely specially in the night
im scared that ill miss you happens every time
i dont want this feelin i cant afford love
i try to find a reason to pull us apart
it aint workin cause youre perfect
and i know that youre worth it
i cant walk away oh
chorus
even though were goin through it
and it makes you feel alone
just know that i would die for you
baby i would die for you yeah
the distance and the time between us
itll never change my mind cause
baby i would die for you
baby i would die for you yeah say
you might also likeverse 2
im findin ways to manipulate the feelin youre goin through
but baby girl im not blamin you
just dont blame me too yeah
cause i cant take this pain forever
and you wont find no one thats better
cause im right for you babe
i think im right for you babe

you know what im thinkin see it in your eyes
you hate that you want me hate it when you cry
it aint workin cause youre perfect
and i know that youre worth it
i cant walk away oh

nanana nanana nanana
